sys_ui_message.message:
Sick leave may not be taken as holiday leave. Sick leave is unplanned leave taken by an employee due to illness. A Medical Doctor or a Medical Pratictioner registered with South Health Council deems an employee unfit to work due to illness for a set time period as set out in the medical certificate provided to an employee. The employee will be required to submit the certificate when capturing sick leave benefit on Workday.
For more information about sick leave process in South Africa, take a look at this [article](https://absahr.service-now.com/myhrportal?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0010232).
